subject: Football
Bars
lead_paragraph: Patriots’ quarterback Matt Cassel had the support of his friends in Southern California who cheered, groaned, cursed and ultimately toasted the New England’s 19-10 victory over the Jets.
snippet: Patriots’ quarterback Matt Cassel had the support of his friends in Southern California who cheered, groaned, cursed and ultimately toasted the New England’s 19-10 victory over the Jets.
